input: Which one of the following expenditure is not charged on the consolidated fund of India?

options.A: Salary and allowances of the President of India
options.B: Salary and allowances of the Vice President of India
options.C: Salary and allowances of the Justice of the Supreme Court of India
options.D: Salary and allowances of the speaker of the Lok Sabha

explanation: Salary and allowances of the speakers of the Lok Sabha is not charged on the consolidated fund of India.
